$schema.description: This should point to either http://hyperfoil.io/schema.json or local file

agents.description: Agent nodes that should drive the load.

always.description: Run fixed number of concurrent users.

atOnce.description: Start fixed number of concurrent users.

constantRate.description: Add new users to the system at constant rate.

maxSessions.description: Maximum number of users (active sessions) executing this phase concurrently.

variance.description: Add new users randomly following Poisson process (true, default) or evenly (false).

decreasingRate.description: Decreases new users arrival rate over its duration.

increasingRate.description: Increases new users arrival rate over its duration.

noop.description: Does not execute anything. Useful for orchestrating phases or adding pauses.

staircase.desription: Shortcut for alternating increasingRate and constantRate phases

rampUpDuration.description: Duration of each ramp-up iteration between steady-states.

initialUsersPerSec.description: Number of users per second after initial ramp-up.

incrementUsersPerSec.description: Number of users added in each iteration.

maxSessions.description: Maximum number of users (active sessions) executing concurrently.

usersPerSec.description: Single-phase shortcut: Rate for new users

maxSessions.description: Single-phase shortcut: Maximum number of users (active sessions) executing this phase concurrently.

duration.description: Single-phase shortcut: Time relative to phase start for the phase to be finished.

maxDuration.description: Single-phase shortcut: Hard limit, relative to phase start, after which the phase will be terminated.

ergonomics.description: Adjust scenario to implement common functionality out-of-the-box.

repeatCookies.description: Store cookies in session and resend them on future requests. Default is true.

userAgentFromSession.description: Append session ID and client hostname as user agent

autoRangeCheck.description: Inject status handler that marks the request as invalid on status 4xx or 5xx. Default is true.

stopOnInvalid.description: Inject completion handler that will stop the session if the request has been marked as invalid. Default is true.

followRedirect.description: Automatically fire requests when the server responds with redirection. Default is NEVER.

host.description: Target hostname. For simplicity this can include scheme and port, too.

addresses.description: List of IP addresses that should be used. The connections will be randomly created to addresses in this list, or using `host` if it's empty.

allowHttp1x.description: Allow using HTTP 1.0 and HTTP 1.1 connections. Default is true.

allowHttp2.description: Allow using HTTP 2.0 connections. Default is true.

connectionStrategy.description: Connection pooling model. Default is SHARED_POOL.

directHttp2.description: Start HTTP 2.0 connections without HTTP 1.x -> 2.0 upgrade. Default is false.

keyManager.description: TLS key manager for setting up client certificates.

maxHttp2Streams.description: Maximum number of concurrent HTTP 2.0 streams on single TCP connection. Default is 100.

sharedConnections.description: Maximum number of connections to the server, shared between all phases and sessions. Default is 1.

pipeliningLimit.description: Maximum number of HTTP 1.1 requests pipelined on a connection. Default is 1.

requestTimeout.description: Default timeout for all HTTP requests. Default is 30 seconds.

rawBytesHandlers.description: Add handlers to support parsing raw HTTP responses. Default is true.

trustManager.description: TLS trust manager for setting up server certificates.

startTime.description: Scheduled time (relative to benchmark start) for the phase to start. Default is immediatelly.

startAfter.description: Phases that must be finished for this phase to start.

startAfterStrict.description: Phases that must be terminated for this phase to start.

duration.description: Time relative to phase start for the phase to be finished.

maxDuration.description: Hard limit, relative to phase start, after which the phase will be terminated.

maxIterations.description: Maximum number of phase iterations. Default is 1.

forks.description: Concurrent sub-phases sharing the limits and users arrivals.

rampRatePhase.description: Add new users to the system at varying rate.

initialUsersPerSec.description: Rate for new users at the beginning of phase

targetUsersPerSec.description: Rate for new users at the end of phase

maxSessions.description: Maximum number of users (active sessions) executing this phase concurrently.

variance.description: Add new users randomly following Poisson process (true, default) or evenly (false).

oneOf.description: Actions that a single user will execute.

initialSequences.description: Sequences scheduled for execution with a new session

sequences.description: Sequences that need to be explicitly triggered.

oneOf.$comment: Steps are inserted here through Generator
